Class StreemExtensionsKt

      Checks if the requested features are supported on this device. Calls resultCallback asynchronously with the result.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        @NotNull
public static Streem initialize(@NotNull
                                         Streem.Companion $receiver,
                                         @NotNull
                                         android.app.Application application,
                                         @NotNull
                                         java.lang.CharSequence appId,
                                         @NotNull
                                         kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super java.lang.Throwable,kotlin.Unit> errorListener)

        Initializes the Streem SDK. Should be called in the Application's onCreate method.

        Parameters:
        appId - application's ID provided by Streem.
        errorListener - callback that will be called if an error is encountered by theStreem SDK (at any point in the future, not only during initialization). The callbackwill be called on the Android main thread.

      • initialize

        @NotNull
public static Streem initialize(@NotNull
                                         Streem.Companion $receiver,
                                         @NotNull
                                         android.app.Application application,
                                         @NotNull
                                         java.lang.CharSequence appId,
                                         @NotNull
                                         java.lang.CharSequence appSecret,
                                         @NotNull
                                         kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super java.lang.Throwable,kotlin.Unit> errorListener)

        Initializes the Streem SDK with an optional appSecret. Check the SDK documentation for when this overload of initialize is needed.

        See initialize for details on the other parameters.

        See Also:
        appSecret, initialize

      • checkSupport

        public static void checkSupport(@NotNull
                                Streem $receiver,
                                @NotNull
                                Streem.Feature[] feature,
                                @NotNull
                                kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super java.lang.Boolean,kotlin.Unit> resultCallback)

        Checks if the requested features are supported on this device. Calls resultCallback asynchronously with the result.

        The callback will be called on the Android main thread.

        See Also:
        feature, resultCallback
